name: Joined together at the lovestruck Bar
name_original: Joined together at the lovestruck Bar
description:
Greetings fellow Gamejam Enthusiasts!

For the Theme 'Joined together' we decided to make a game about bringing people together:

Dating. You are the Waiter in a Restaurant, that is planning a Date Night for the evening and your Task is to Match the people as well as you can. The goal is to get the Restaurant to a 5 Star Rating!

Game was coded by me in Unity, my friend TripleTuner made all the Pixelart and my Father DocHog composed the super chill Soundtrack.

If the Webbuild does not work, there is also a Windows download. Hope you guys enjoy the game!
